items: Attach a rope or cable to a high pulley machine.
Kneel down in front of the machine and grab the rope with both hands, palms facing down.
Bring your hands to the back of your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Extend your arms upwards, straightening your elbows and contracting your triceps.
Slowly lower the rope back down to the starting position, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Repeat for desired number of repetitions.

content.title: Cable Kneeling Triceps Extension Form & Visual

items: Targets the triceps muscles, helping to tone and strengthen them
Improves overall arm strength and definition
Engages the core muscles for added stability and balance
Can be easily modified to increase or decrease resistance, making it suitable for all fitness levels
Requires minimal equipment and can be done at home or in the gym
